rComments: Great lecturer, inspiring and funny!  He always provoque you to think and keeps pushing you until you get it, utilizing reading material, movies, pictures and discussion. We went  to a coffee shop on Stevenson  with the entire class to talk about the history of tea in colonial india! I went abroad to study Spanish after taking his cool class!

I graduated a few years back and Ricard is the reason why I also went abroad and now I'm working on my PhD, he made me think, question and analize everything in context . One of the best instructors I had while at UCSC. This dude is brilliant, thoughtful and funny!

Ricard is the reason why I went abroad to Spain and Chile. He encouraged the students to go out, learn a language, grow, visit another culture and to pursue graduate studies after our BA. He is the most engaging professor I ever had, I remember that gave a lecture he gave on Film, using historic and cultural references that made the whole

OMG, I have not been able to take a class with him. I had him for two classes (this was my last year at UCSC) I think Professor Torres-Mateluna was one of the most engaging instructors during my passing through college. I learned so much about literature, politics, culture, music, cinema with him. I wish you could take a class with him. Thanks Prof

He should be in charge of class. I learned more with Ricardo than with Poblette (who should be doing something else but teaching) Ricardo is clear, engaging and vry smart...he knows so much about cinema, literature, history and politics!!!

If you can take a class with him, he is very engaging and knowledgeable, he brings the reading to a whole different level, he mixes the class reading with current events, history and anecdotes to put your learning experience in context. He actually makes you think beyond the text, promoting class discussion.  He has a great sense of humor (if you a

At first his sense of humor was a little weird. Then I learned that he was refering to history, the texts and other support materials for the class.   He is really smart, very helpful and always greets you with a smile!   I'm learning a lot in this class. The readings are more fun when he pushes you to analize the historically!!!  Great instructor!

One of the most productive learning experiences in my education....  He is a great pedagoge, so dynamic and engaging, he makes you think globally and invite you to learn in a way that no many professors do these days.  Did I mention that he is HOT!?
Great instructor, he know sooooo much about politics, latinamerican cinema and world culture... he is also hot. I really enjoy attending his classes!!!!!
